    1028                 :  * @param bool $preloadonly true means do not return access array                                                                                                                                
    1029                 :  * @return array accessdata                                                                                                                                                                      
    1030                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1031                 : function get_user_accessdata($userid, $preloadonly=false) {                                                                                                                                      
    1032               0 :     global $CFG, $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE, $USER;                                                                                                                                                      
    1033                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1034               0 :     if (!empty($USER->acces['rdef']) and empty($ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->rolepermissions)) {                                                                                                           
    1035                 :         // share rdef from USER session with rolepermissions cache in order to conserve memory                                                                                                   
    1036               0 :         foreach($USER->acces['rdef'] as $k=>$v) {                                                                                                                                                
    1037               0 :             $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->rolepermissions[$k] =& $USER->acces['rdef'][$k];                                                                                                                 
    1038               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1039               0 :         $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->accessdatabyuser[$USER->id] = $USER->acces;                                                                                                                          
    1040               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1041                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1042               0 :     if (!isset($ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->accessdatabyuser[$userid])) {                                                                                                                                 
    1043               0 :         if (empty($userid)) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    1044               0 :             if (!empty($CFG->notloggedinroleid)) {                                                                                                                                               
    1045               0 :                 $accessdata = get_role_access($CFG->notloggedinroleid);                                                                                                                          
    1046               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                             
    1047                 :                 // weird                                                                                                                                                                         
    1048               0 :                 return get_empty_accessdata();                                                                                                                                                   
    1049                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1050                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1051               0 :         } else if (isguestuser($userid)) {                                                                                                                                                       
    1052               0 :             if ($guestrole = get_guest_role()) {                                                                                                                                                 
    1053               0 :                 $accessdata = get_role_access($guestrole->id);                                                                                                                                   
    1054               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                             
    1055                 :                 //weird                                                                                                                                                                          
    1056               0 :                 return get_empty_accessdata();                                                                                                                                                   
    1057                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1058                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1059               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1060               0 :             $accessdata = get_user_access_sitewide($userid); // includes default role and frontpage role                                                                                         
    1061                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1062                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1063               0 :         $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->accessdatabyuser[$userid] = $accessdata;                                                                                                                             
    1064               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1065                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1066               0 :     if ($preloadonly) {                                                                                                                                                                          
    1067               0 :         return;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1068                 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1069               0 :         return $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->accessdatabyuser[$userid];                                                                                                                                    
    1070                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1071                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1072                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1073                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1074                 :  * Try to minimise the size of $USER->access by eliminating duplicate override storage,                                                                                                          
    1075                 :  * this function looks for contexts with the same overrides and shares them.                                                                                                                     
    1076                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1077                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    1078                 :  * @return void                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1079                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1080                 : function dedupe_user_access() {                                                                                                                                                                  
    1081               0 :     global $USER;                                                                                                                                                                                
    1082                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1083               0 :     if (CLI_SCRIPT) {                                                                                                                                                                            
    1084                 :         // no session in CLI --> no compression necessary                                                                                                                                        
    1085               0 :         return;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1086                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1087                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1088               0 :     if (empty($USER->access['rdef_count'])) {                                                                                                                                                    
    1089                 :         // weird, this should not happen                                                                                                                                                         
    1090               0 :         return;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1091                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1092                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1093                 :     // the rdef is growing only, we never remove stuff from it, the rdef_lcc helps us to detect new stuff in rdef                                                                                
    1094               0 :     if ($USER->access['rdef_count'] - $USER->access['rdef_lcc'] > 10) {                                                                                                                          
    1095                 :         // do not compress after each change, wait till there is more stuff to be done                                                                                                           
    1096               0 :         return;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1097                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1098                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1099               0 :     $hashmap = array();                                                                                                                                                                          
    1100               0 :     foreach ($USER->access['rdef'] as $k=>$def) {                                                                                                                                                
    1101               0 :         $hash = sha1(serialize($def));                                                                                                                                                           
    1102               0 :         if (isset($hashmap[$hash])) {                                                                                                                                                            
    1103               0 :             $USER->access['rdef'][$k] =& $hashmap[$hash];                                                                                                                                        
    1104               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1105               0 :             $hashmap[$hash] =& $USER->access['rdef'][$k];                                                                                                                                        
    1106                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1107               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1108                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1109               0 :     $USER->access['rdef_lcc'] = $USER->access['rdef_count'];                                                                                                                                     
    1110               0 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1111                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1112                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1113                 :  * A convenience function to completely load all the capabilities                                                                                                                                
    1114                 :  * for the current user. It is called from has_capability() and functions change permissions.                                                                                                    
    1115                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1116                 :  * Call it only _after_ you've setup $USER and called check_enrolment_plugins();                                                                                                                 
    1117                 :  * @see check_enrolment_plugins()                                                                                                                                                                
    1118                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1119                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    1120                 :  * @return void                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1121                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1122                 : function load_all_capabilities() {                                                                                                                                                               
    1123               0 :     global $USER;                                                                                                                                                                                
    1124                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1125                 :     // roles not installed yet - we are in the middle of installation                                                                                                                            
    1126               0 :     if (during_initial_install()) {                                                                                                                                                              
    1127               0 :         return;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1128                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1129                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1130               0 :     if (!isset($USER->id)) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    1131                 :         // this should not happen                                                                                                                                                                
    1132               0 :         $USER->id = 0;                                                                                                                                                                           
    1133               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1134                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1135               0 :     unset($USER->access);                                                                                                                                                                        
    1136               0 :     $USER->access = get_user_accessdata($USER->id);                                                                                                                                              
    1137                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1138                 :     // deduplicate the overrides to minimize session size                                                                                                                                        
    1139               0 :     dedupe_user_access();                                                                                                                                                                        
    1140                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1141                 :     // Clear to force a refresh                                                                                                                                                                  
    1142               0 :     unset($USER->mycourses);                                                                                                                                                                     
    1143                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1144                 :     // init/reset internal enrol caches - active course enrolments and temp access                                                                                                               
    1145               0 :     $USER->enrol = array('enrolled'=>array(), 'tempguest'=>array());                                                                                                                             
    1146               0 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1147                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1148                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1149                 :  * A convenience function to completely reload all the capabilities                                                                                                                              
    1150                 :  * for the current user when roles have been updated in a relevant                                                                                                                               
    1151                 :  * context -- but PRESERVING switchroles and loginas.                                                                                                                                            
    1152                 :  * This function resets all accesslib and context caches.                                                                                                                                        
    1153                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1154                 :  * That is - completely transparent to the user.                                                                                                                                                 
    1155                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1156                 :  * Note: reloads $USER->access completely.                                                                                                                                                       
    1157                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1158                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    1159                 :  * @return void                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1160                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1161                 : function reload_all_capabilities() {                                                                                                                                                             
    1162               0 :     global $USER, $DB, $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE;                                                                                                                                                       
    1163                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1164                 :     // copy switchroles                                                                                                                                                                          
    1165               0 :     $sw = array();                                                                                                                                                                               
    1166               0 :     if (!empty($USER->access['rsw'])) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1167               0 :         $sw = $USER->access['rsw'];                                                                                                                                                              
    1168               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1169                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1170               0 :     accesslib_clear_all_caches(true);                                                                                                                                                            
    1171               0 :     unset($USER->access);                                                                                                                                                                        
    1172               0 :     $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->dirtycontexts = array(); // prevent dirty flags refetching on this page                                                                                                  
    1173                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1174               0 :     load_all_capabilities();                                                                                                                                                                     
    1175                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1176               0 :     foreach ($sw as $path => $roleid) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1177               0 :         if ($record = $DB->get_record('context', array('path'=>$path))) {                                                                                                                        
    1178               0 :             $context = context::instance_by_id($record->id);                                                                                                                                     
    1179               0 :             role_switch($roleid, $context);                                                                                                                                                      
    1180               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1181               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1182               0 : }

    1244               0 :         return;

    1248                 :               FROM {role_assignments} ra

    1299               0 :             $type = 'manager';                                                                                                                                                                   
    1300               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1301                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1302               0 :         if (!array_key_exists($type, $archetypes)) {

    1304               0 :         }

    1317                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1318                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1319                 :  * Verify capability risks.                                                                                                                                                                      
    1320                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1321                 :  * @param stdClass $capability a capability - a row from the capabilities table.                                                                                                                 
    1322                 :  * @return boolean whether this capability is safe - that is, whether people with the                                                                                                            
    1323                 :  *      safeoverrides capability should be allowed to change it.                                                                                                                                 
    1324                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    1325                 : function is_safe_capability($capability) {                                                                                                                                                       
    1326               0 :     return !((RISK_DATALOSS | RISK_MANAGETRUST | RISK_CONFIG | RISK_XSS | RISK_PERSONAL) & $capability->riskbitmask);                                                                            
    1327                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1328                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1329                 : /**

    1348                 : function get_context_info_array($contextid) {

    1350                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1351               0 :     $context = context::instance_by_id($contextid, MUST_EXIST);

    1356               0 :         $course = $DB->get_record('course', array('id'=>$context->instanceid), '*', MUST_EXIST);

    1361                 :

    1364                 :

    1372                 :

    1525                 : /**

    1538                 : function get_roles_with_capability($capability, $permission = null, $context = null) {                                                                                                           
    1539               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1540                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1541               0 :     if ($context) {                                                                                                                                                                              
    1542               0 :         $contexts = $context->get_parent_context_ids(true);                                                                                                                                      
    1543               0 :         list($insql, $params) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($contexts, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'ctx');                                                                                                        
    1544               0 :         $contextsql = "AND rc.contextid $insql";                                                                                                                                                 
    1545               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1546               0 :         $params = array();                                                                                                                                                                       
    1547               0 :         $contextsql = '';                                                                                                                                                                        
    1548                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1549                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1550               0 :     if ($permission) {                                                                                                                                                                           
    1551               0 :         $permissionsql = " AND rc.permission = :permission";                                                                                                                                     
    1552               0 :         $params['permission'] = $permission;                                                                                                                                                     
    1553               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1554               0 :         $permissionsql = '';                                                                                                                                                                     
    1555                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1556                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1557                 :     $sql = "SELECT r.*                                                                                                                                                                           
    1558                 :               FROM {role} r                                                                                                                                                                      
    1559                 :              WHERE r.id IN (SELECT rc.roleid                                                                                                                                                     
    1560                 :                               FROM {role_capabilities} rc                                                                                                                                        
    1561                 :                              WHERE rc.capability = :capname                                                                                                                                      
    1562                 :                                    $contextsql                                                                                                                                                   
    1563               0 :                                    $permissionsql)";                                                                                                                                             
    1564               0 :     $params['capname'] = $capability;                                                                                                                                                            
    1565                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1566                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1567               0 :     return $DB->get_records_sql($sql, $params);                                                                                                                                                  
    1568                 : }

    1708                 : function role_unassign_all(array $params, $subcontexts = false, $includemanual = false) {

    1710                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1711               0 :     if (!$params) {

    1813                 : function isguestuser($user = null) {

    1826               0 :     }

    1830               0 :         return false;

    1837               0 :             return false; // not logged in means is not be guest

    1920                 : /**

    1935                 : function is_enrolled(context $context, $user = null, $withcapability = '', $onlyactive = false) {                                                                                                
    1936               0 :     global $USER, $DB;                                                                                                                                                                           
    1937                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1938                 :     // first find the course context                                                                                                                                                             
    1939               0 :     $coursecontext = $context->get_course_context();                                                                                                                                             
    1940                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1941                 :     // make sure there is a real user specified                                                                                                                                                  
    1942               0 :     if ($user === null) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    1943               0 :         $userid = isset($USER->id) ? $USER->id : 0;                                                                                                                                              
    1944               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1945               0 :         $userid = is_object($user) ? $user->id : $user;                                                                                                                                          
    1946                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1947                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1948               0 :     if (empty($userid)) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    1949                 :         // not-logged-in!                                                                                                                                                                        
    1950               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                            
    1951               0 :     } else if (isguestuser($userid)) {                                                                                                                                                           
    1952                 :         // guest account can not be enrolled anywhere                                                                                                                                            
    1953               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                            
    1954                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1955                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1956               0 :     if ($coursecontext->instanceid == SITEID) {                                                                                                                                                  
    1957                 :         // everybody participates on frontpage                                                                                                                                                   
    1958               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1959                 :         // try cached info first - the enrolled flag is set only when active enrolment present                                                                                                   
    1960               0 :         if ($USER->id == $userid) {                                                                                                                                                              
    1961               0 :             $coursecontext->reload_if_dirty();                                                                                                                                                   
    1962               0 :             if (isset($USER->enrol['enrolled'][$coursecontext->instanceid])) {

    1964               0 :                     return true;                                                                                                                                                                 
    1965                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    1966               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1967               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1968                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1969               0 :         if ($onlyactive) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    1970                 :             // look for active enrolments only                                                                                                                                                   
    1971               0 :             $until = enrol_get_enrolment_end($coursecontext->instanceid, $userid);                                                                                                               
    1972                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1973               0 :             if ($until === false) {                                                                                                                                                              
    1974               0 :                 return false;                                                                                                                                                                    
    1975                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1976                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1977               0 :             if ($USER->id == $userid) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1978               0 :                 if ($until == 0) {                                                                                                                                                               
    1979               0 :                     $until = ENROL_MAX_TIMESTAMP;                                                                                                                                                
    1980               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    1981               0 :                 $USER->enrol['enrolled'][$coursecontext->instanceid] = $until;                                                                                                                   
    1982               0 :                 if (isset($USER->enrol['tempguest'][$coursecontext->instanceid])) {                                                                                                              
    1983               0 :                     unset($USER->enrol['tempguest'][$coursecontext->instanceid]);                                                                                                                
    1984               0 :                     remove_temp_course_roles($coursecontext);                                                                                                                                    
    1985               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    1986               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    1987                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1988               0 :         } else {

    1990                 :             $sql = "SELECT 'x'                                                                                                                                                                   
    1991                 :                       FROM {user_enrolments} ue                                                                                                                                                  
    1992                 :                       JOIN {enrol} e ON (e.id = ue.enrolid AND e.courseid = :courseid)                                                                                                           
    1993                 :                       JOIN {user} u ON u.id = ue.userid                                                                                                                                          
    1994               0 :                      WHERE ue.userid = :userid AND u.deleted = 0";

    1997               0 :                 return false;                                                                                                                                                                    
    1998                 :             }

    2003               0 :         return false;

    2005                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2006               0 :     return true;

    2008                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2009                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2010                 :  * Returns true if the user is able to access the course.                                                                                                                                        
    2011                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2012                 :  * This function is in no way, shape, or form a substitute for require_login.                                                                                                                    
    2013                 :  * It should only be used in circumstances where it is not possible to call require_login                                                                                                        
    2014                 :  * such as the navigation.                                                                                                                                                                       
    2015                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2016                 :  * This function checks many of the methods of access to a course such as the view                                                                                                               
    2017                 :  * capability, enrollments, and guest access. It also makes use of the cache                                                                                                                     
    2018                 :  * generated by require_login for guest access.                                                                                                                                                  
    2019                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2020                 :  * The flags within the $USER object that are used here should NEVER be used outside                                                                                                             
    2021                 :  * of this function can_access_course and require_login. Doing so WILL break future                                                                                                              
    2022                 :  * versions.                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2023                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2024                 :  * @param stdClass $course record                                                                                                                                                                
    2025                 :  * @param stdClass|int|null $user user record or id, current user if null                                                                                                                        
    2026                 :  * @param string $withcapability Check for this capability as well.                                                                                                                              
    2027                 :  * @param bool $onlyactive consider only active enrolments in enabled plugins and time restrictions                                                                                              
    2028                 :  * @return boolean Returns true if the user is able to access the course                                                                                                                         
    2029                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2030                 : function can_access_course(stdClass $course, $user = null, $withcapability = '', $onlyactive = false) {                                                                                          
    2031               0 :     global $DB, $USER;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2032                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2033                 :     // this function originally accepted $coursecontext parameter                                                                                                                                
    2034               0 :     if ($course instanceof context) {                                                                                                                                                            
    2035               0 :         if ($course instanceof context_course) {                                                                                                                                                 
    2036               0 :             debugging('deprecated context parameter, please use $course record');                                                                                                                
    2037               0 :             $coursecontext = $course;                                                                                                                                                            
    2038               0 :             $course = $DB->get_record('course', array('id'=>$coursecontext->instanceid));                                                                                                        
    2039               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2040               0 :             debugging('Invalid context parameter, please use $course record');                                                                                                                   
    2041               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2042                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2043               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2044               0 :         $coursecontext = context_course::instance($course->id);                                                                                                                                  
    2045                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2046                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2047               0 :     if (!isset($USER->id)) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    2048                 :         // should never happen                                                                                                                                                                   
    2049               0 :         $USER->id = 0;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2050               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2051                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2052                 :     // make sure there is a user specified                                                                                                                                                       
    2053               0 :     if ($user === null) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    2054               0 :         $userid = $USER->id;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2055               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2056               0 :         $userid = is_object($user) ? $user->id : $user;                                                                                                                                          
    2057                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2058               0 :     unset($user);                                                                                                                                                                                
    2059                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2060               0 :     if ($withcapability and !has_capability($withcapability, $coursecontext, $userid)) {                                                                                                         
    2061               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                            
    2062                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2063                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2064               0 :     if ($userid == $USER->id) {                                                                                                                                                                  
    2065               0 :         if (!empty($USER->access['rsw'][$coursecontext->path])) {                                                                                                                                
    2066                 :             // the fact that somebody switched role means they can access the course no matter to what role they switched

    2350                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2351                 :  * Loads the capability definitions for the component (from file).                                                                                                                               
    2352                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2353                 :  * Loads the capability definitions for the component (from file). If no                                                                                                                         
    2354                 :  * capabilities are defined for the component, we simply return an empty array.                                                                                                                  
    2355                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2356                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    2357                 :  * @param string $component full plugin name, examples: 'moodle', 'mod_forum'                                                                                                                    
    2358                 :  * @return array array of capabilities                                                                                                                                                           
    2359                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2360                 : function load_capability_def($component) {
