    2362                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2363               0 :     $capabilities = array();                                                                                                                                                                     
    2364               0 :     if (file_exists($defpath)) {                                                                                                                                                                 
    2365               0 :         require($defpath);                                                                                                                                                                       
    2366               0 :         if (!empty(${$component.'_capabilities'})) {                                                                                                                                             
    2367                 :             // BC capability array name                                                                                                                                                          
    2368                 :             // since 2.0 we prefer $capabilities instead - it is easier to use and matches db/* files                                                                                            
    2369               0 :             debugging('componentname_capabilities array is deprecated, please use $capabilities array only in access.php files');                                                                
    2370               0 :             $capabilities = ${$component.'_capabilities'};                                                                                                                                       
    2371               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2372               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2373                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2374               0 :     return $capabilities;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2375                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2376                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2377                 : /**

    2380                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    2381                 :  * @param string $component - examples: 'moodle', 'mod_forum'                                                                                                                                    
    2382                 :  * @return array array of capabilities

    2384                 : function get_cached_capabilities($component = 'moodle') {

    2387                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2388                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2389                 : /**

    2397                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2398               0 :     if (!$archetype) {                                                                                                                                                                           
    2399               0 :         return array();

    2401                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2402               0 :     $alldefs = array();

    2452                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2453                 :  * Updates the capabilities table with the component capability definitions.                                                                                                                     
    2454                 :  * If no parameters are given, the function updates the core moodle

    2456                 :  *

    2458                 :  * will cause any stored capabilities for the component to be removed from                                                                                                                       
    2459                 :  * the database.

    2461                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    2462                 :  * @param string $component examples: 'moodle', 'mod/forum', 'block/quiz_results'                                                                                                                
    2463                 :  * @return boolean true if success, exception in case of any problems                                                                                                                            
    2464                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2465                 : function update_capabilities($component = 'moodle') {                                                                                                                                            
    2466               0 :     global $DB, $OUTPUT;                                                                                                                                                                         
    2467                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2468               0 :     $storedcaps = array();                                                                                                                                                                       
    2469                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2470               0 :     $filecaps = load_capability_def($component);                                                                                                                                                 
    2471               0 :     foreach($filecaps as $capname=>$unused) {                                                                                                                                                    
    2472               0 :         if (!preg_match('|^[a-z]+/[a-z_0-9]+:[a-z_0-9]+$|', $capname)) {                                                                                                                         
    2473               0 :             debugging("Coding problem: Invalid capability name '$capname', use 'clonepermissionsfrom' field for migration.");                                                                    
    2474               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2475               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2476                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2477               0 :     $cachedcaps = get_cached_capabilities($component);                                                                                                                                           
    2478               0 :     if ($cachedcaps) {                                                                                                                                                                           
    2479               0 :         foreach ($cachedcaps as $cachedcap) {                                                                                                                                                    
    2480               0 :             array_push($storedcaps, $cachedcap->name);                                                                                                                                           
    2481                 :             // update risk bitmasks and context levels in existing capabilities if needed                                                                                                        
    2482               0 :             if (array_key_exists($cachedcap->name, $filecaps)) {                                                                                                                                 
    2483               0 :                 if (!array_key_exists('riskbitmask', $filecaps[$cachedcap->name])) {                                                                                                             
    2484               0 :                     $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['riskbitmask'] = 0; // no risk if not specified                                                                                                  
    2485               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    2486               0 :                 if ($cachedcap->captype != $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['captype']) {                                                                                                             
    2487               0 :                     $updatecap = new stdClass();                                                                                                                                                 
    2488               0 :                     $updatecap->id = $cachedcap->id;                                                                                                                                             
    2489               0 :                     $updatecap->captype = $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['captype'];                                                                                                                
    2490               0 :                     $DB->update_record('capabilities', $updatecap);                                                                                                                              
    2491               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    2492               0 :                 if ($cachedcap->riskbitmask != $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['riskbitmask']) {                                                                                                     
    2493               0 :                     $updatecap = new stdClass();                                                                                                                                                 
    2494               0 :                     $updatecap->id = $cachedcap->id;                                                                                                                                             
    2495               0 :                     $updatecap->riskbitmask = $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['riskbitmask'];                                                                                                        
    2496               0 :                     $DB->update_record('capabilities', $updatecap);                                                                                                                              
    2497               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    2498                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2499               0 :                 if (!array_key_exists('contextlevel', $filecaps[$cachedcap->name])) {

    2501               0 :                 }

    2503               0 :                     $updatecap = new stdClass();                                                                                                                                                 
    2504               0 :                     $updatecap->id = $cachedcap->id;                                                                                                                                             
    2505               0 :                     $updatecap->contextlevel = $filecaps[$cachedcap->name]['contextlevel'];                                                                                                      
    2506               0 :                     $DB->update_record('capabilities', $updatecap);                                                                                                                              
    2507               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    2508               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2509               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2510               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2511                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2512                 :     // Are there new capabilities in the file definition?                                                                                                                                        
    2513               0 :     $newcaps = array();                                                                                                                                                                          
    2514                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2515               0 :     foreach ($filecaps as $filecap => $def) {                                                                                                                                                    
    2516               0 :         if (!$storedcaps ||                                                                                                                                                                      
    2517               0 :                 ($storedcaps && in_array($filecap, $storedcaps) === false)) {

    2519               0 :                 $def['riskbitmask'] = 0; // no risk if not specified                                                                                                                             
    2520               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2521               0 :             $newcaps[$filecap] = $def;                                                                                                                                                           
    2522               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2523               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2524                 :     // Add new capabilities to the stored definition.                                                                                                                                            
    2525               0 :     $existingcaps = $DB->get_records_menu('capabilities', array(), 'id', 'id, name');                                                                                                            
    2526               0 :     foreach ($newcaps as $capname => $capdef) {                                                                                                                                                  
    2527               0 :         $capability = new stdClass();                                                                                                                                                            
    2528               0 :         $capability->name         = $capname;                                                                                                                                                    
    2529               0 :         $capability->captype      = $capdef['captype'];

    2531               0 :         $capability->component    = $component;                                                                                                                                                  
    2532               0 :         $capability->riskbitmask  = $capdef['riskbitmask'];                                                                                                                                      
    2533                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2534               0 :         $DB->insert_record('capabilities', $capability, false);                                                                                                                                  
    2535                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2536               0 :         if (isset($capdef['clonepermissionsfrom']) && in_array($capdef['clonepermissionsfrom'], $existingcaps)){

    2549                 :         // 'legacy' is for backward compatibility with 1.9 access.php

    2551               0 :             assign_legacy_capabilities($capname, $capdef['legacy']);                                                                                                                             
    2552               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2553               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2554                 :     // Are there any capabilities that have been removed from the file

    2556                 :     // role assignments?

    2558                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2559                 :     // reset static caches                                                                                                                                                                       
    2560               0 :     accesslib_clear_all_caches(false);                                                                                                                                                           
    2561                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2562               0 :     return true;                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2563                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2564                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2565                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2566                 :  * Deletes cached capabilities that are no longer needed by the component.                                                                                                                       
    2567                 :  * Also unassigns these capabilities from any roles that have them.                                                                                                                              
    2568                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2569                 :  * @access private                                                                                                                                                                               
    2570                 :  * @param string $component examples: 'moodle', 'mod_forum', 'block_quiz_results'                                                                                                                
    2571                 :  * @param array $newcapdef array of the new capability definitions that will be                                                                                                                  
    2572                 :  *                     compared with the cached capabilities                                                                                                                                     
    2573                 :  * @return int number of deprecated capabilities that have been removed                                                                                                                          
    2574                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2575                 : function capabilities_cleanup($component, $newcapdef = null) {                                                                                                                                   
    2576               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2577                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2578               0 :     $removedcount = 0;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2579                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2580               0 :     if ($cachedcaps = get_cached_capabilities($component)) {                                                                                                                                     
    2581               0 :         foreach ($cachedcaps as $cachedcap) {                                                                                                                                                    
    2582               0 :             if (empty($newcapdef) ||                                                                                                                                                             
    2583               0 :                         array_key_exists($cachedcap->name, $newcapdef) === false) {                                                                                                              
    2584                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2585                 :                 // Remove from capabilities cache.                                                                                                                                               
    2586               0 :                 $DB->delete_records('capabilities', array('name'=>$cachedcap->name));                                                                                                            
    2587               0 :                 $removedcount++;                                                                                                                                                                 
    2588                 :                 // Delete from roles.                                                                                                                                                            
    2589               0 :                 if ($roles = get_roles_with_capability($cachedcap->name)) {                                                                                                                      
    2590               0 :                     foreach($roles as $role) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2591               0 :                         if (!unassign_capability($cachedcap->name, $role->id)) {                                                                                                                 
    2592               0 :                             print_error('cannotunassigncap', 'error', '', (object)array('cap'=>$cachedcap->name, 'role'=>$role->name));                                                          
    2593               0 :                         }                                                                                                                                                                        
    2594               0 :                     }                                                                                                                                                                            
    2595               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    2596               0 :             } // End if.                                                                                                                                                                         
    2597               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2598               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2599               0 :     return $removedcount;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2600                 : }

    2641                 : function role_context_capabilities($roleid, context $context, $cap = '') {                                                                                                                       
    2642               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2643                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2644               0 :     $contexts = $context->get_parent_context_ids(true);                                                                                                                                          
    2645               0 :     $contexts = '('.implode(',', $contexts).')';                                                                                                                                                 
    2646                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2647               0 :     $params = array($roleid);                                                                                                                                                                    
    2648                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2649               0 :     if ($cap) {                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2650               0 :         $search = " AND rc.capability = ? ";                                                                                                                                                     
    2651               0 :         $params[] = $cap;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2652               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2653               0 :         $search = '';                                                                                                                                                                            
    2654                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2655                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2656                 :     $sql = "SELECT rc.*                                                                                                                                                                          
    2657                 :               FROM {role_capabilities} rc, {context} c                                                                                                                                           
    2658                 :              WHERE rc.contextid in $contexts                                                                                                                                                     
    2659                 :                    AND rc.roleid = ?                                                                                                                                                             
    2660               0 :                    AND rc.contextid = c.id $search                                                                                                                                               
    2661               0 :           ORDER BY c.contextlevel DESC, rc.capability DESC";                                                                                                                                     
    2662                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2663               0 :     $capabilities = array();                                                                                                                                                                     
    2664                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2665               0 :     if ($records = $DB->get_records_sql($sql, $params)) {                                                                                                                                        
    2666                 :         // We are traversing via reverse order.                                                                                                                                                  
    2667               0 :         foreach ($records as $record) {                                                                                                                                                          
    2668                 :             // If not set yet (i.e. inherit or not set at all), or currently we have a prohibit                                                                                                  
    2669               0 :             if (!isset($capabilities[$record->capability]) || $record->permission<-500) {                                                                                                        
    2670               0 :                 $capabilities[$record->capability] = $record->permission;                                                                                                                        
    2671               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2672               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2673               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2674               0 :     return $capabilities;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2675                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2676                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2677                 : /**

    2685                 : function get_context_info_list(context $context) {

    2689               0 :     while ($contextids2) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    2690               0 :         $contextpaths[] = '/' . implode('/', $contextids2);                                                                                                                                      
    2691               0 :         array_pop($contextids2);                                                                                                                                                                 
    2692               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2693               0 :     return array($contextids, $contextpaths);                                                                                                                                                    
    2694                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2695                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2696                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2697                 :  * Check if context is the front page context or a context inside it                                                                                                                             
    2698                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2699                 :  * Returns true if this context is the front page context, or a context inside it,                                                                                                               
    2700                 :  * otherwise false.                                                                                                                                                                              
    2701                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2702                 :  * @param context $context a context object.                                                                                                                                                     
    2703                 :  * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2704                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2705                 : function is_inside_frontpage(context $context) {                                                                                                                                                 
    2706               0 :     $frontpagecontext = context_course::instance(SITEID);                                                                                                                                        
    2707               0 :     return strpos($context->path . '/', $frontpagecontext->path . '/') === 0;                                                                                                                    
    2708                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    2709                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2710                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2711                 :  * Returns capability information (cached)                                                                                                                                                       
    2712                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2713                 :  * @param string $capabilityname                                                                                                                                                                 
    2714                 :  * @return stdClass or null if capability not found                                                                                                                                              
    2715                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    2716                 : function get_capability_info($capabilityname) {                                                                                                                                                  
    2717               0 :     global $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE, $DB; // one request per page only                                                                                                                                 
    2718                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2719                 :     //TODO: MUC - this could be cached in shared memory, it would eliminate 1 query per page                                                                                                     
    2720                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2721               0 :     if (empty($ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->capabilities)) {                                                                                                                                               
    2722               0 :         $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->capabilities = array();                                                                                                                                              
    2723               0 :         $caps = $DB->get_records('capabilities', array(), 'id, name, captype, riskbitmask');                                                                                                     
    2724               0 :         foreach ($caps as $cap) {                                                                                                                                                                
    2725               0 :             $capname = $cap->name;                                                                                                                                                               
    2726               0 :             unset($cap->id);                                                                                                                                                                     
    2727               0 :             unset($cap->name);                                                                                                                                                                   
    2728               0 :             $cap->riskbitmask = (int)$cap->riskbitmask;                                                                                                                                          
    2729               0 :             $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->capabilities[$capname] = $cap;                                                                                                                                   
    2730               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2731               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2732                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2733               0 :     return isset($ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->capabilities[$capabilityname]) ? $ACCESSLIB_PRIVATE->capabilities[$capabilityname] : null;                                                                  
    2734                 : }

    3067                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3068                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3069                 :  * Gets a list of roles that this user can assign in this context                                                                                                                                
    3070                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3071                 :  * @param context $context the context.                                                                                                                                                          
    3072                 :  * @param int $rolenamedisplay the type of role name to display. One of the                                                                                                                      
    3073                 :  *      ROLENAME_X constants. Default ROLENAME_ALIAS.                                                                                                                                            
    3074                 :  * @param bool $withusercounts if true, count the number of users with each role.
