    3369                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3370                 :  * Set the context levels at which a particular role can be assigned.                                                                                                                            
    3371                 :  * Throws exceptions in case of error.                                                                                                                                                           
    3372                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3373                 :  * @param integer $roleid the id of a role.                                                                                                                                                      
    3374                 :  * @param array $contextlevels the context levels at which this role should be assignable,                                                                                                       
    3375                 :  *      duplicate levels are removed.                                                                                                                                                            
    3376                 :  * @return void                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3377                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3378                 : function set_role_contextlevels($roleid, array $contextlevels) {                                                                                                                                 
    3379               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3380               0 :     $DB->delete_records('role_context_levels', array('roleid' => $roleid));                                                                                                                      
    3381               0 :     $rcl = new stdClass();                                                                                                                                                                       
    3382               0 :     $rcl->roleid = $roleid;                                                                                                                                                                      
    3383               0 :     $contextlevels = array_unique($contextlevels);                                                                                                                                               
    3384               0 :     foreach ($contextlevels as $level) {                                                                                                                                                         
    3385               0 :         $rcl->contextlevel = $level;                                                                                                                                                             
    3386               0 :         $DB->insert_record('role_context_levels', $rcl, false, true);                                                                                                                            
    3387               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3388               0 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3389                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3390                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3391                 :  * Who has this capability in this context?                                                                                                                                                      
    3392                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3393                 :  * This can be a very expensive call - use sparingly and keep                                                                                                                                    
    3394                 :  * the results if you are going to need them again soon.                                                                                                                                         
    3395                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3396                 :  * Note if $fields is empty this function attempts to get u.*                                                                                                                                    
    3397                 :  * which can get rather large - and has a serious perf impact                                                                                                                                    
    3398                 :  * on some DBs.                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3399                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3400                 :  * @param context $context                                                                                                                                                                       
    3401                 :  * @param string|array $capability - capability name(s)                                                                                                                                          
    3402                 :  * @param string $fields - fields to be pulled. The user table is aliased to 'u'. u.id MUST be included.                                                                                         
    3403                 :  * @param string $sort - the sort order. Default is lastaccess time.                                                                                                                             
    3404                 :  * @param mixed $limitfrom - number of records to skip (offset)                                                                                                                                  
    3405                 :  * @param mixed $limitnum - number of records to fetch                                                                                                                                           
    3406                 :  * @param string|array $groups - single group or array of groups - only return                                                                                                                   
    3407                 :  *               users who are in one of these group(s).                                                                                                                                         
    3408                 :  * @param string|array $exceptions - list of users to exclude, comma separated or array                                                                                                          
    3409                 :  * @param bool $doanything_ignored not used any more, admin accounts are never returned                                                                                                          
    3410                 :  * @param bool $view_ignored - use get_enrolled_sql() instead                                                                                                                                    
    3411                 :  * @param bool $useviewallgroups if $groups is set the return users who                                                                                                                          
    3412                 :  *               have capability both $capability and moodle/site:accessallgroups                                                                                                                
    3413                 :  *               in this context, as well as users who have $capability and who are                                                                                                              
    3414                 :  *               in $groups.                                                                                                                                                                     
    3415                 :  * @return array of user records                                                                                                                                                                 
    3416                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3417                 : function get_users_by_capability(context $context, $capability, $fields = '', $sort = '', $limitfrom = '', $limitnum = '',                                                                       
    3418                 :                                  $groups = '', $exceptions = '', $doanything_ignored = null, $view_ignored = null, $useviewallgroups = false) {                                                  
    3419               0 :     global $CFG, $DB;                                                                                                                                                                            
    3420                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3421               0 :     $defaultuserroleid      = isset($CFG->defaultuserroleid) ? $CFG->defaultuserroleid : 0;                                                                                                      
    3422               0 :     $defaultfrontpageroleid = isset($CFG->defaultfrontpageroleid) ? $CFG->defaultfrontpageroleid : 0;                                                                                            
    3423                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3424               0 :     $ctxids = trim($context->path, '/');                                                                                                                                                         
    3425               0 :     $ctxids = str_replace('/', ',', $ctxids);                                                                                                                                                    
    3426                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3427                 :     // Context is the frontpage                                                                                                                                                                  
    3428               0 :     $iscoursepage = false; // coursepage other than fp                                                                                                                                           
    3429               0 :     $isfrontpage = false;                                                                                                                                                                        
    3430               0 :     if ($context->contextlevel == CONTEXT_COURSE) {                                                                                                                                              
    3431               0 :         if ($context->instanceid == SITEID) {                                                                                                                                                    
    3432               0 :             $isfrontpage = true;                                                                                                                                                                 
    3433               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3434               0 :             $iscoursepage = true;                                                                                                                                                                
    3435                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3436               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3437               0 :     $isfrontpage = ($isfrontpage || is_inside_frontpage($context));                                                                                                                              
    3438                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3439               0 :     $caps = (array)$capability;                                                                                                                                                                  
    3440                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3441                 :     // construct list of context paths bottom-->top                                                                                                                                              
    3442               0 :     list($contextids, $paths) = get_context_info_list($context);                                                                                                                                 
    3443                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3444                 :     // we need to find out all roles that have these capabilities either in definition or in overrides                                                                                           
    3445               0 :     $defs = array();                                                                                                                                                                             
    3446               0 :     list($incontexts, $params) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($contextids, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'con');                                                                                                     
    3447               0 :     list($incaps, $params2) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($caps, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'cap');                                                                                                              
    3448               0 :     $params = array_merge($params, $params2);                                                                                                                                                    
    3449                 :     $sql = "SELECT rc.id, rc.roleid, rc.permission, rc.capability, ctx.path                                                                                                                      
    3450                 :               FROM {role_capabilities} rc                                                                                                                                                        
    3451                 :               JOIN {context} ctx on rc.contextid = ctx.id                                                                                                                                        
    3452               0 :              WHERE rc.contextid $incontexts AND rc.capability $incaps";                                                                                                                          
    3453                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3454               0 :     $rcs = $DB->get_records_sql($sql, $params);                                                                                                                                                  
    3455               0 :     foreach ($rcs as $rc) {                                                                                                                                                                      
    3456               0 :         $defs[$rc->capability][$rc->path][$rc->roleid] = $rc->permission;                                                                                                                        
    3457               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3458                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3459                 :     // go through the permissions bottom-->top direction to evaluate the current permission,                                                                                                     
    3460                 :     // first one wins (prohibit is an exception that always wins)                                                                                                                                
    3461               0 :     $access = array();                                                                                                                                                                           
    3462               0 :     foreach ($caps as $cap) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    3463               0 :         foreach ($paths as $path) {                                                                                                                                                              
    3464               0 :             if (empty($defs[$cap][$path])) {                                                                                                                                                     
    3465               0 :                 continue;                                                                                                                                                                        
    3466                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3467               0 :             foreach($defs[$cap][$path] as $roleid => $perm) {                                                                                                                                    
    3468               0 :                 if ($perm == CAP_PROHIBIT) {                                                                                                                                                     
    3469               0 :                     $access[$cap][$roleid] = CAP_PROHIBIT;                                                                                                                                       
    3470               0 :                     continue;                                                                                                                                                                    
    3471                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    3472               0 :                 if (!isset($access[$cap][$roleid])) {                                                                                                                                            
    3473               0 :                     $access[$cap][$roleid] = (int)$perm;                                                                                                                                         
    3474               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    3475               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3476               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3477               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3478                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3479                 :     // make lists of roles that are needed and prohibited in this context                                                                                                                        
    3480               0 :     $needed = array(); // one of these is enough                                                                                                                                                 
    3481               0 :     $prohibited = array(); // must not have any of these                                                                                                                                         
    3482               0 :     foreach ($caps as $cap) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    3483               0 :         if (empty($access[$cap])) {                                                                                                                                                              
    3484               0 :             continue;                                                                                                                                                                            
    3485                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3486               0 :         foreach ($access[$cap] as $roleid => $perm) {                                                                                                                                            
    3487               0 :             if ($perm == CAP_PROHIBIT) {                                                                                                                                                         
    3488               0 :                 unset($needed[$cap][$roleid]);                                                                                                                                                   
    3489               0 :                 $prohibited[$cap][$roleid] = true;                                                                                                                                               
    3490               0 :             } else if ($perm == CAP_ALLOW and empty($prohibited[$cap][$roleid])) {                                                                                                               
    3491               0 :                 $needed[$cap][$roleid] = true;                                                                                                                                                   
    3492               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3493               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3494               0 :         if (empty($needed[$cap]) or !empty($prohibited[$cap][$defaultuserroleid])) {                                                                                                             
    3495                 :             // easy, nobody has the permission                                                                                                                                                   
    3496               0 :             unset($needed[$cap]);                                                                                                                                                                
    3497               0 :             unset($prohibited[$cap]);                                                                                                                                                            
    3498               0 :         } else if ($isfrontpage and !empty($prohibited[$cap][$defaultfrontpageroleid])) {                                                                                                        
    3499                 :             // everybody is disqualified on the frontpage                                                                                                                                        
    3500               0 :             unset($needed[$cap]);                                                                                                                                                                
    3501               0 :             unset($prohibited[$cap]);                                                                                                                                                            
    3502               0 :         }

    3504               0 :             unset($prohibited[$cap]);                                                                                                                                                            
    3505               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3506               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3507                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3508               0 :     if (empty($needed)) {
