    3512                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3513               0 :     if (empty($prohibited)) {                                                                                                                                                                    
    3514                 :         // we can compact the needed roles                                                                                                                                                       
    3515               0 :         $n = array();                                                                                                                                                                            
    3516               0 :         foreach ($needed as $cap) {                                                                                                                                                              
    3517               0 :             foreach ($cap as $roleid=>$unused) {                                                                                                                                                 
    3518               0 :                 $n[$roleid] = true;                                                                                                                                                              
    3519               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3520               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3521               0 :         $needed = array('any'=>$n);                                                                                                                                                              
    3522               0 :         unset($n);                                                                                                                                                                               
    3523               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3524                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3525                 :     // ***** Set up default fields ******                                                                                                                                                        
    3526               0 :     if (empty($fields)) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    3527               0 :         if ($iscoursepage) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    3528               0 :             $fields = 'u.*, ul.timeaccess AS lastaccess';                                                                                                                                        
    3529               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3530               0 :             $fields = 'u.*';                                                                                                                                                                     
    3531                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3532               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3533               0 :         if (debugging('', DEBUG_DEVELOPER) && strpos($fields, 'u.*') === false && strpos($fields, 'u.id') === false) {                                                                           
    3534               0 :             debugging('u.id must be included in the list of fields passed to get_users_by_capability().', DEBUG_DEVELOPER);                                                                      
    3535               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3536                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3537                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3538                 :     // Set up default sort                                                                                                                                                                       
    3539               0 :     if (empty($sort)) { // default to course lastaccess or just lastaccess                                                                                                                       
    3540               0 :         if ($iscoursepage) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    3541               0 :             $sort = 'ul.timeaccess';                                                                                                                                                             
    3542               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3543               0 :             $sort = 'u.lastaccess';                                                                                                                                                              
    3544                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3545               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3546                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3547                 :     // Prepare query clauses                                                                                                                                                                     
    3548               0 :     $wherecond = array();                                                                                                                                                                        
    3549               0 :     $params    = array();                                                                                                                                                                        
    3550               0 :     $joins     = array();                                                                                                                                                                        
    3551                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3552                 :     // User lastaccess JOIN                                                                                                                                                                      
    3553               0 :     if ((strpos($sort, 'ul.timeaccess') === false) and (strpos($fields, 'ul.timeaccess') === false)) {                                                                                           
    3554                 :          // user_lastaccess is not required MDL-13810                                                                                                                                            
    3555               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3556               0 :         if ($iscoursepage) {                                                                                                                                                                     
    3557               0 :             $joins[] = "LEFT OUTER JOIN {user_lastaccess} ul ON (ul.userid = u.id AND ul.courseid = {$context->instanceid})";                                                                    
    3558               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3559               0 :             throw new coding_exception('Invalid sort in get_users_by_capability(), ul.timeaccess allowed only for course contexts.');                                                            
    3560                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3561                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3562                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3563                 :     // We never return deleted users or guest account.                                                                                                                                           
    3564               0 :     $wherecond[] = "u.deleted = 0 AND u.id <> :guestid";                                                                                                                                         
    3565               0 :     $params['guestid'] = $CFG->siteguest;                                                                                                                                                        
    3566                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3567                 :     // Groups                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3568               0 :     if ($groups) {                                                                                                                                                                               
    3569               0 :         $groups = (array)$groups;                                                                                                                                                                
    3570               0 :         list($grouptest, $grpparams) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($groups, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'grp');                                                                                                   
    3571               0 :         $grouptest = "u.id IN (SELECT userid FROM {groups_members} gm WHERE gm.groupid $grouptest)";                                                                                             
    3572               0 :         $params = array_merge($params, $grpparams);                                                                                                                                              
    3573                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3574               0 :         if ($useviewallgroups) {                                                                                                                                                                 
    3575               0 :             $viewallgroupsusers = get_users_by_capability($context, 'moodle/site:accessallgroups', 'u.id, u.id', '', '', '', '', $exceptions);                                                   
    3576               0 :             if (!empty($viewallgroupsusers)) {                                                                                                                                                   
    3577               0 :                 $wherecond[] =  "($grouptest OR u.id IN (" . implode(',', array_keys($viewallgroupsusers)) . '))';                                                                               
    3578               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                             
    3579               0 :                 $wherecond[] =  "($grouptest)";                                                                                                                                                  
    3580                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3581               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3582               0 :             $wherecond[] =  "($grouptest)";                                                                                                                                                      
    3583                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3584               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3585                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3586                 :     // User exceptions                                                                                                                                                                           
    3587               0 :     if (!empty($exceptions)) {                                                                                                                                                                   
    3588               0 :         $exceptions = (array)$exceptions;                                                                                                                                                        
    3589               0 :         list($exsql, $exparams) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($exceptions, SQL_PARAMS_NAMED, 'exc', false);                                                                                             
    3590               0 :         $params = array_merge($params, $exparams);                                                                                                                                               
    3591               0 :         $wherecond[] = "u.id $exsql";                                                                                                                                                            
    3592               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3593                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3594                 :     // now add the needed and prohibited roles conditions as joins                                                                                                                               
    3595               0 :     if (!empty($needed['any'])) {                                                                                                                                                                
    3596                 :         // simple case - there are no prohibits involved                                                                                                                                         
    3597               0 :         if (!empty($needed['any'][$defaultuserroleid]) or ($isfrontpage and !empty($needed['any'][$defaultfrontpageroleid]))) {                                                                  
    3598                 :             // everybody                                                                                                                                                                         
    3599               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3600               0 :             $joins[] = "JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT userid                                                                                                                                             
    3601                 :                                 FROM {role_assignments}                                                                                                                                          
    3602                 :                                WHERE contextid IN ($ctxids)                                                                                                                                      
    3603               0 :                                      AND roleid IN (".implode(',', array_keys($needed['any'])) .")                                                                                               
    3604               0 :                              ) ra ON ra.userid = u.id";                                                                                                                                          
    3605                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3606               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3607               0 :         $unions = array();                                                                                                                                                                       
    3608               0 :         $everybody = false;                                                                                                                                                                      
    3609               0 :         foreach ($needed as $cap=>$unused) {                                                                                                                                                     
    3610               0 :             if (empty($prohibited[$cap])) {                                                                                                                                                      
    3611               0 :                 if (!empty($needed[$cap][$defaultuserroleid]) or ($isfrontpage and !empty($needed[$cap][$defaultfrontpageroleid]))) {                                                            
    3612               0 :                     $everybody = true;                                                                                                                                                           
    3613               0 :                     break;                                                                                                                                                                       
    3614                 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                         
    3615               0 :                     $unions[] = "SELECT userid                                                                                                                                                   
    3616                 :                                    FROM {role_assignments}                                                                                                                                       
    3617                 :                                   WHERE contextid IN ($ctxids)                                                                                                                                   
    3618               0 :                                         AND roleid IN (".implode(',', array_keys($needed[$cap])) .")";                                                                                           
    3619                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    3620               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                             
    3621               0 :                 if (!empty($prohibited[$cap][$defaultuserroleid]) or ($isfrontpage and !empty($prohibited[$cap][$defaultfrontpageroleid]))) {                                                    
    3622                 :                     // nobody can have this cap because it is prevented in default roles                                                                                                         
    3623               0 :                     continue;                                                                                                                                                                    
    3624                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3625               0 :                 } else if (!empty($needed[$cap][$defaultuserroleid]) or ($isfrontpage and !empty($needed[$cap][$defaultfrontpageroleid]))) {                                                     
    3626                 :                     // everybody except the prohibitted - hiding does not matter                                                                                                                 
    3627               0 :                     $unions[] = "SELECT id AS userid                                                                                                                                             
    3628                 :                                    FROM {user}                                                                                                                                                   
    3629                 :                                   WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT userid                                                                                                                                 
    3630                 :                                                      FROM {role_assignments}                                                                                                                     
    3631                 :                                                     WHERE contextid IN ($ctxids)                                                                                                                 
    3632               0 :                                                           AND roleid IN (".implode(',', array_keys($prohibited[$cap])) ."))";                                                                    
    3633                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3634               0 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                         
    3635               0 :                     $unions[] = "SELECT userid                                                                                                                                                   
    3636                 :                                    FROM {role_assignments}                                                                                                                                       
    3637                 :                                   WHERE contextid IN ($ctxids)                                                                                                                                   
    3638               0 :                                         AND roleid IN (".implode(',', array_keys($needed[$cap])) .")                                                                                             
    3639               0 :                                         AND roleid NOT IN (".implode(',', array_keys($prohibited[$cap])) .")";                                                                                   
    3640                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                                
    3641                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3642               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3643               0 :         if (!$everybody) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    3644               0 :             if ($unions) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    3645               0 :                 $joins[] = "JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT userid FROM ( ".implode(' UNION ', $unions)." ) us) ra ON ra.userid = u.id";                                                                   
    3646               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                             
    3647                 :                 // only prohibits found - nobody can be matched                                                                                                                                  
    3648               0 :                 $wherecond[] = "1 = 2";                                                                                                                                                          
    3649                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3650               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3651                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3652                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3653                 :     // Collect WHERE conditions and needed joins                                                                                                                                                 
    3654               0 :     $where = implode(' AND ', $wherecond);                                                                                                                                                       
    3655               0 :     if ($where !== '') {                                                                                                                                                                         
    3656               0 :         $where = 'WHERE ' . $where;                                                                                                                                                              
    3657               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3658               0 :     $joins = implode("\n", $joins);                                                                                                                                                              
    3659                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3660                 :     // Ok, let's get the users!                                                                                                                                                                  
    3661                 :     $sql = "SELECT $fields                                                                                                                                                                       
    3662                 :               FROM {user} u                                                                                                                                                                      
    3663               0 :             $joins                                                                                                                                                                               
    3664               0 :             $where                                                                                                                                                                               
    3665               0 :           ORDER BY $sort";                                                                                                                                                                       
    3666                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3667               0 :     return $DB->get_records_sql($sql, $params, $limitfrom, $limitnum);                                                                                                                           
    3668                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3669                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3670                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3671                 :  * Re-sort a users array based on a sorting policy                                                                                                                                               
    3672                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3673                 :  * Will re-sort a $users results array (from get_users_by_capability(), usually)                                                                                                                 
    3674                 :  * based on a sorting policy. This is to support the odd practice of                                                                                                                             
    3675                 :  * sorting teachers by 'authority', where authority was "lowest id of the role                                                                                                                   
    3676                 :  * assignment".                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3677                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3678                 :  * Will execute 1 database query. Only suitable for small numbers of users, as it                                                                                                                
    3679                 :  * uses an u.id IN() clause.                                                                                                                                                                     
    3680                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3681                 :  * Notes about the sorting criteria.                                                                                                                                                             
    3682                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3683                 :  * As a default, we cannot rely on role.sortorder because then                                                                                                                                   
    3684                 :  * admins/coursecreators will always win. That is why the sane                                                                                                                                   
    3685                 :  * rule "is locality matters most", with sortorder as 2nd                                                                                                                                        
    3686                 :  * consideration.                                                                                                                                                                                
    3687                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3688                 :  * If you want role.sortorder, use the 'sortorder' policy, and                                                                                                                                   
    3689                 :  * name explicitly what roles you want to cover. It's probably                                                                                                                                   
    3690                 :  * a good idea to see what roles have the capabilities you want                                                                                                                                  
    3691                 :  * (array_diff() them against roiles that have 'can-do-anything'                                                                                                                                 
    3692                 :  * to weed out admin-ish roles. Or fetch a list of roles from                                                                                                                                    
    3693                 :  * variables like $CFG->coursecontact .                                                                                                                                                          
    3694                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3695                 :  * @param array $users Users array, keyed on userid                                                                                                                                              
    3696                 :  * @param context $context                                                                                                                                                                       
    3697                 :  * @param array $roles ids of the roles to include, optional                                                                                                                                     
    3698                 :  * @param string $sortpolicy defaults to locality, more about                                                                                                                                    
    3699                 :  * @return array sorted copy of the array                                                                                                                                                        
    3700                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3701                 : function sort_by_roleassignment_authority($users, context $context, $roles = array(), $sortpolicy = 'locality') {                                                                                
    3702               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3703                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3704               0 :     $userswhere = ' ra.userid IN (' . implode(',',array_keys($users)) . ')';                                                                                                                     
    3705               0 :     $contextwhere = 'AND ra.contextid IN ('.str_replace('/', ',',substr($context->path, 1)).')';                                                                                                 
    3706               0 :     if (empty($roles)) {                                                                                                                                                                         
    3707               0 :         $roleswhere = '';                                                                                                                                                                        
    3708               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3709               0 :         $roleswhere = ' AND ra.roleid IN ('.implode(',',$roles).')';                                                                                                                             
    3710                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3711                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3712                 :     $sql = "SELECT ra.userid                                                                                                                                                                     
    3713                 :               FROM {role_assignments} ra                                                                                                                                                         
    3714                 :               JOIN {role} r                                                                                                                                                                      
    3715                 :                    ON ra.roleid=r.id                                                                                                                                                             
    3716                 :               JOIN {context} ctx                                                                                                                                                                 
    3717                 :                    ON ra.contextid=ctx.id                                                                                                                                                        
    3718                 :              WHERE $userswhere                                                                                                                                                                   
    3719               0 :                    $contextwhere                                                                                                                                                                 
    3720               0 :                    $roleswhere";                                                                                                                                                                 
    3721                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3722                 :     // Default 'locality' policy -- read PHPDoc notes                                                                                                                                            
    3723                 :     // about sort policies...                                                                                                                                                                    
    3724                 :     $orderby = 'ORDER BY '                                                                                                                                                                       
    3725                 :                     .'ctx.depth DESC, '  /* locality wins */                                                                                                                                     
    3726               0 :                     .'r.sortorder ASC, ' /* rolesorting 2nd criteria */                                                                                                                          
    3727               0 :                     .'ra.id';            /* role assignment order tie-breaker */                                                                                                                 
    3728               0 :     if ($sortpolicy === 'sortorder') {                                                                                                                                                           
    3729                 :         $orderby = 'ORDER BY '                                                                                                                                                                   
    3730                 :                         .'r.sortorder ASC, ' /* rolesorting 2nd criteria */                                                                                                                      
    3731               0 :                         .'ra.id';            /* role assignment order tie-breaker */                                                                                                             
    3732               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3733                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3734               0 :     $sortedids = $DB->get_fieldset_sql($sql . $orderby);                                                                                                                                         
    3735               0 :     $sortedusers = array();                                                                                                                                                                      
    3736               0 :     $seen = array();                                                                                                                                                                             
    3737                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3738               0 :     foreach ($sortedids as $id) {                                                                                                                                                                
    3739                 :         // Avoid duplicates                                                                                                                                                                      
    3740               0 :         if (isset($seen[$id])) {                                                                                                                                                                 
    3741               0 :             continue;                                                                                                                                                                            
    3742                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3743               0 :         $seen[$id] = true;                                                                                                                                                                       
    3744                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3745                 :         // assign                                                                                                                                                                                
    3746               0 :         $sortedusers[$id] = $users[$id];                                                                                                                                                         
    3747               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3748               0 :     return $sortedusers;                                                                                                                                                                         
    3749                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3750                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3751                 : /**

    3770               0 :     global $DB;                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3771                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3772               0 :     if (empty($fields)) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    3773                 :         $fields = 'u.id, u.confirmed, u.username, u.firstname, u.lastname, '.                                                                                                                    
    3774               0 :                   'u.maildisplay, u.mailformat, u.maildigest, u.email, u.emailstop, u.city, '.

    3779               0 :     $parentcontexts = '';                                                                                                                                                                        
    3780               0 :     if ($parent) {                                                                                                                                                                               
    3781               0 :         $parentcontexts = substr($context->path, 1); // kill leading slash

    3785               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3786               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3787                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3788               0 :     if ($roleid) {                                                                                                                                                                               
    3789               0 :         list($rids, $params) = $DB->get_in_or_equal($roleid, SQL_PARAMS_QM);                                                                                                                     
    3790               0 :         $roleselect = "AND ra.roleid $rids";                                                                                                                                                     
    3791               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3792               0 :         $params = array();                                                                                                                                                                       
    3793               0 :         $roleselect = '';                                                                                                                                                                        
    3794                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3795                 :

    3799               0 :         $params[] = $group;                                                                                                                                                                      
    3800               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3801               0 :         $groupjoin   = '';                                                                                                                                                                       
    3802               0 :         $groupselect = '';                                                                                                                                                                       
    3803                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3804                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3805               0 :     array_unshift($params, $context->id);                                                                                                                                                        
    3806                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3807               0 :     if ($extrawheretest) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    3808               0 :         $extrawheretest = ' AND ' . $extrawheretest;                                                                                                                                             
    3809               0 :         $params = array_merge($params, $whereparams);                                                                                                                                            
    3810               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3811                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3812                 :     $sql = "SELECT DISTINCT $fields, ra.roleid                                                                                                                                                   
    3813                 :               FROM {role_assignments} ra                                                                                                                                                         
    3814                 :               JOIN {user} u ON u.id = ra.userid

    3816               0 :         $groupjoin

    3818               0 :                    $roleselect                                                                                                                                                                   
    3819               0 :                    $groupselect                                                                                                                                                                  
    3820               0 :                    $extrawheretest

    3822                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3823               0 :     return $DB->get_records_sql($sql, $params, $limitfrom, $limitnum);                                                                                                                           
    3824                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                                
    3825                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3826                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                              
    3827                 :  * Counts all the users assigned this role in this context or higher                                                                                                                             
    3828                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                               
    3829                 :  * @param int|array $roleid either int or an array of ints
